virtual-sensor.name: Thur_DozerDecagonMux_pos3_chart3
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerDecagonMuxMsg) information from Thur deployment

address.predicate: select GENERATIONTIME, PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE0, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID0, PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE1, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID1, PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE2, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID2, PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE3, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID3, PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE4, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID4 from Thur_DozerDecagonMux_mapped_1396 where POSITION = 3 and PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID = 1

source.query: select GENERATIONTIME, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID0 = 0, NULL, (PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE0 - 400) / 10) as T0, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID1 = 0, NULL, (PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE1 - 400) / 10) as T1, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID2 = 0, NULL, (PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE2 - 400) / 10) as T2, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID3 = 0, NULL, (PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE3 - 400) / 10) as T3, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID4 = 0, NULL, (PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE4 - 400) / 10) as T4 from wrapper
